description: This Java class defines the TodoService, a core service component responsible for managing Todo items in a task-tracking backend application. It provides methods for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, toggling completion status, and deleting Todo entities, interacting with a repository layer for persistence.

classes.name: TodoService
classes.description: A service class annotated with Spring's @Service and @Transactional annotations, providing business logic for managing Todo items including CRUD operations and state toggling.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Todo item based on the provided TodoCreateRequest and persists it using the repository.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Todo items filtered by completion status and a search query.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a Todo item by its unique identifier, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Todo item with new data; supports full (PUT) or partial (PATCH) updates.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Inverts the completion status of the specified Todo item.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a Todo item by its ID, throwing NotFoundException if it does not exist.
